text: Liam Walsh (12 September 1998 – 19 September 2021A tribute to Liam Walsh) was a professional rugby league footballer who played as a second-row forward for the Widnes Vikings in the Betfred Championship. In 2017 he made his Super League début for Widnes against the Leeds Rhinos. ==References== ==Other websites== *Widnes Vikings profile *SL profile *Leeds Rhinos v Widnes Vikings Category:1998 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British rugby league players Category:Sportspeople from Lancashire
title: Liam Walsh (rugby league)
